programme.desc: As últimas notícias sobre testes científicos realizados na escola de South Park revelam que alguns dos meninos estão viciados em sexo.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Kyle, Cartman Kenny e Stan se juntam com os cidadãos de South Park e lutam bravamente contra a dominação de Nova Jersey em uma onda que está afetando todo o país

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Kyle está "intestinalmente" envolvido no desenvolvimento de um novo produto revolucionário que será lançado pela Apple chamado HumancentiPad.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Kyle participa do mais recente empreendimento de Cartman, a Associação Atlética de Bebês do Crack.
programme.sub-title: Associação Atlética de Bebês do Crack

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Os garotos estão próximos de descobrir a verdade sobre o primeiro Dia de Ação de Graças da história dos Estados Unidos.
programme.sub-title: Dia de Ação de Graças no History Channel

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Uma nova garota chega na escola e todo mundo quer saber por quem ela tem uma queda, e Cartman está especialmente animado.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Ike chega à puberdade, mas Kyle se preocupa com o fato de que ele e seu irmão menor estão se distanciando. Dessa forma, Kyle o leva a uma apresentação ao vivo de seu programa de TV favorito.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Cartman facilita a paz mundial com sua última brincadeira, o que leva os líderes religiosos a South Park para testemunhar o acontecimento de uma profecia bíblica.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Kyle não entende por que Ike e seus amigos querem ver as pessoas comentar sobre coisas acontecendo, em vez de experimentá-la por si mesmos. Enquanto isso, Randy tem que apresentar ao vivo para fazer algum dinheiro.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Kyle ainda está pertubado pois Ike e seus amigos o chamam de vovó. Enquanto isso, vários hologramas estão à solta em South Park.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Cartman se considera um critico de restaurante on-line em South Park, e vai visitar o restaurante dos novos moradores da cidade.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Heidi Turner quer iniciar uma dieta vegana com Eric Cartman, enquanto Kyle quer saber o motivo pelo qual ele ainda está com ela. Neste mesmo capítulo, veja como a popularidade do presidente diminui cada dia mais.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: O diretor PC começa a nutrir sentimentos amorosos pela vice-diretora da escola. Terrance e Phillip querem assinar um contrato com a Netflix e Kyle está cansado de ser humilhado por Heidi e Cartman.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: A mãe de Kyle faz um transplante fecal e os meninos recebem a missão de pegar o melhor microbioma.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Os rapazes querem se destacar na aula de genética para irritar Terrance e estão tentando fazer um cruzamento entre o elefante de Kyle com a porca do Cartman, "Fofa".
programme.sub-title: Um elefante faz amor com um porco

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Kyle está se sentindo só por ser judio. Fora isso, ninguém acredita nele quando ele tenta convercer os cidadãos de South Park sobre a existência de Mr.Hankey, o cocô do Natal.
programme.sub-title: Sr. Hankey, o Poo de Natal

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Os rapazes encontram um objeto misterioso em uma escavação escolar e saem no jornal. Barbra Streisand aparece na cidade buscando o tal objeto, pois é a última peça necessária para que ela possa se transformar em um monstro japonês gigante.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Os garotos descobrem o que significa ser circuncidado e tentam salvar Ike do seu destino. O senhor Mackey é demitido, se entrega às drogas e se torna um hippie.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Os rapazes estão viciados em "Chinpokomon" (uma paródia de Pokémon) e querem comprar os bonecos, os jogos e qualquer outra coisa relacionada com eles.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Os rapazes precisam de dinheiro para investir em videogames. Então eles resolvem roubar dentes, já que a fada dos dentes paga por isso.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Kyle está doente e sua mãe está tentando curar ele através da sabedoria de medicina natural uma velha curandeira e seus colaboradores "nativos americanos". Enquanto isso, senhor Garrison se transforma em escritor de novelas românticas.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Kyle que ir a um concerto, mas seus pais não deixam. Cartman sugere que ele vá à polícia e diga que seus pais o molestaram, para que assim eles sejam presos.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: O primo do Kyle, que também se chama Kyle, veio de Connecticut para visitar sua mãe em South Park. Porém, apesar da mesma idade, os primos não tem nada em comum.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: A professora de arte coloca os alunos de castigo e decidem se vingar. Durante a noite, invadem sua casa e a enrolam em papel higiênico. Agora, a polícia está atrás dos responsáveis, e isso faz com que Kyle se arrependa.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Kyle diz que, como presente de aniversário, sua mãe levará ele e três amigos para a Casa Bonita. A alegria de Cartman acaba quando Kyle decide convidar Stan, Kenny e Butters. Agora Butters precisa "desaparecer".

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Após passar por uma operação para mudar de sexo, o senhor Garrison finalmente se sente como uma verdadeira mulher. Enquanto isso, Kyle quer fazer uma cirurgia para ficar negro e assim, conseguir ser aceito pelo time de basquete.
programme.sub-title: A Nova Vagina Chique do Professor Garrison

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Os locutores do show da baleia Jambú fazem com que as crianças acreditem que a baleia pode falar, e que ela se chama Willzyx, que está doente e morrerá se não regressar à sua casa na lua. Agora os meninos querem levar a baleia para a lua.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: O pai de Kyle compra um carro híbrido e tenta convencer todas as pessoas de que esta é a melhor opção para cuidar do planeta. Porém, ao brigar com todos em função de sua atitude esquisita, se muda para São Francisco com sua família.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Cartman acha que os ataques do dia 11 de setembro fazem parte de uma conspiração, e se dispõe para trazer a verdade à luz. Enquanto isso, o senhor Mackey apenas quer saber quem foi o infeliz que defecou no mictório.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Cartman jura que viu um duende. Ele está tão obcecado com isso, que inclusive faz uma aposta com Kyle para provar que os duendes existem. Eles encontram o duende, e agora Kyle precisa cumprir com a aposta.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Stan e Kyle se tornam prisioneiros do Pentágono até contarem exatamente como chegaram à Terra da Imaginação. Cartman não desistirá da aposta e quer que Kyle chupe suas bolas, conforme o combinado.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Quando estão na Terra da Imaginação, Stan e Butters tem que lutar contra um exército de forças imaginárias do mal. A Suprema Corte declara que as criaturas imaginárias não são reais e planeja destruir a Terra da Imaginação.

programme.title: We're No Angels
programme.desc: Humphrey Bogart plays one of his rare comedy roles in this jaunty excursion about three convicts - Joseph (Bogart), Albert (Aldo Ray) and Jules (Peter Ustinov) - who are plotting their escape from Devil's Island.

programme.title: Artists and Models
programme.desc: A goonish young man receives telepathic top secret information in his nightmares, which are used by his artist friend in comic strips. Foreign agents and the CIA get interested.

programme.title: The Thomas Crown Affair
programme.desc: Steve McQueen stars as a sophisticated but bored tycoon who pulls off a bank heist so stunning that even Boston's finest are baffled. Faye Dunaway is the sleek insurance investigator out to bring him in but who, ultimately, falls in love with him.

programme.title: The Reivers
programme.desc: From the Pulitzer Prize-Winning novel by William Faulkner, Steve McQueen stars in the story of a Mississippi boy who drives to Memphis with two rascals in his family's new car—a 1905 Winton Flyer.

programme.title: The Great Escape
programme.desc: Steve McQueen, James Garner, and Richard Attenborough headline a stellar cast in one of the most ingenious and suspenseful adventure films of all time as a team of Allied soldiers mount a daring escape from an inescapable Nazi POW camp.

programme.title: The Train
programme.desc: Screen greats Burt Lancaster, Paul Scofield and Jeanne Moreau star in this suspense-laden tale of justice and retribution as a French Resistance fighter (Lancaster) attempts to stop a Nazi commander from looting the art treasures of Paris.

programme.title: Stalag 17
programme.desc: Laced with comedy and cynicism, this is the story of a group of GIs who are thrown together in the notorious German prison camp Stalag 17, their suspicions about one being a spy and their efforts to escape.

programme.title: The Great Raid
programme.desc: As World War II rages, the elite 6th Ranger Battalion is given a mission of heroic proportions: push 30 miles behind enemy lines and liberate over 500 American prisoners of war.

programme.title: Flags Of Our Fathers
programme.desc: From Academy Award-winning director Clint Eastwood and Academy Award-winner Steven Spielberg, comes the life stories of the six men who raised the flag at The Battle of Iwo Jima, a turning point in WWII.

programme.title: The Great Raid
programme.desc: As World War II rages, the elite 6th Ranger Battalion is given a mission of heroic proportions: push 30 miles behind enemy lines and liberate over 500 American prisoners of war.

programme.title: Apocalypto
programme.desc: As the Mayan kingdom faces its decline, a young man is taken on a perilous journey to a world ruled by fear and oppression.

programme.title: Striking Distance
programme.desc: Coming from a police family, Tom Hardy ends up fighting his uncle after the murder of his father. Tom believes the killer is another cop and goes on the record with his allegations. Demoted then to river duty, the killer taunts Tom.

programme.title: Zero Dark Thirty
programme.desc: For a decade, an elite team of intelligence and military operatives, working in secret across the globe, devoted themselves to a single goal: to find and eliminate Osama bin Laden. ZERO DARK THIRTY tells the story of history's greatest manhunt.

programme.title: Gladiator
programme.desc: A man robbed of his name and his dignity strives to win them back, and gain the freedom of his people, in this epic historical drama from director Ridley Scott.

programme.title: Jeepers Creepers
programme.desc: After making a horrific discovery in the basement of a old church, Trish and her brother Darry watch their routine road trip home turn into a heart stopping race for their lives. They are now the chosen prey of a force that relentlessly pursues them.

programme.title: Jeepers Creepers 2
programme.desc: The Creeper terrorizes a group of varsity basketball players, cheerleaders and coaches who are stranded on a highway after their bus breaks down. Fighting their own fears and prejudices the group of athletes are forced to come together to stay alive.

programme.title: Case 39
programme.desc: Academy Award winner Renee Zellweger stars in this terrifying, supernatural thriller about a social worker who has been assigned the unusual and disturbing case of Lillith Sullivn - a girl with a strange and mysterious past.

programme.title: The Haunting
programme.desc: In this edge-of-your-seat supernatural thriller featuring Hollywood's hottest stars, a study in fear escalates into a heart-stopping nightmare for a professor and three subjects trapped in a mysterious mansion.

programme.title: We Summon The Darkness
programme.desc: A post-concert party at a remote country mansion turns into a grisly satanic slaughter scene in this dark-humored horror-thriller starring Alexandra Daddario and Johnny Knoxville.

programme.title: Winnie The Pooh: Blood and Honey
programme.desc: Winnie-The-Pooh: Blood and Honey follows Pooh and Piglet as they go on a rampage after Christopher Robin abandons them.

programme.title: Cooties
programme.desc: Teachers have the worst Monday ever when their students are turned into little killer savages in this horror comedy with unexpected laughs and unapologetic thrills.

programme.title: Idle Hands
programme.desc: The devil will find work for idle hands to do, but what happens when he chooses the laziest teen slacker in the world to do his dirty work? Anton Tobias is a couch potato burn-out who can't control the murderous impulses of his possessed hand. Rated: R

programme.title: Anna and the Apocalypse
programme.desc: In this gleeful mashup, Anna and her friends must fight – and sing – their way through a zombie invasion to reach the supposed safety of their school, not knowing if their parents and friends will still be alive when they get there.

programme.title: Reborn
programme.desc: Gokudera and Yamamoto suggest that they hang out in town. Suddenly, a boy falls from the sky. That boy has a deathperation flame on his head!

programme.title: Reborn
programme.desc: Tsuna is caught up in a battle between Basil, a boy who apparently has ties to the Vongola, and a mysterious man named Squalo.

programme.title: Reborn
programme.desc: Tsuna and his friends must battle Squalo and the Varia to earn the Vongola Rings, which are handed down from the core members of the Vongola Family.

programme.title: Reborn
programme.desc: As preparation for the upcoming battle continues, Gokudera begins training by himself but gets himself in danger by using risky training methods.

programme.title: Reborn
programme.desc: Reborn tells Tsuna to take a break from their training sessions. When Tsuna goes out to enjoy his free time, strange things happen wherever he goes.

programme.title: Reborn
programme.desc: Reborn calls over Giannini to help prepare Tsuna for the fight against the Varia, but the weapons Giannini modifies are surprisingly useless.

programme.title: Reborn
programme.desc: Tsuna and the others continue training but the Varia's leader realizes that the rings that Squalo had stolen were fakes.
programme.sub-title: The Battle of the Rings Begins!

programme.title: Reborn
programme.desc: The battle for the Vongola Rings to decide who is the true Vongola heir has begun with a bang! It will be a boxing battle between Ryohei and Lussuria!
programme.sub-title: The Guardian of the Sun Ring's Feelings

programme.title: Reborn
programme.desc: Ryohei has injured his left hand and is dehydrated. He receives permission from Colonnello to use a recovery technique that he had been saving.

programme.title: Reborn
programme.desc: The second battle is between the Lightning Guardians. It is being held in the rain on a special field that spreads the lightning across the ground.
programme.sub-title: Thunder Strike from Twenty Years Later

programme.title: Reborn
programme.desc: Lambo looks like he's going to win the Lightning Guardian battle when he turns into his Twenty-years later form.

programme.title: Reborn
programme.desc: The third battle between Storm Guardians Gokudera and Belphagor is a timed death match. The battle takes place on the third floor of the school.

programme.title: Reborn
programme.desc: Gokudera is able to damage Belphagor with his Rocket Bombs. But when Belphagor sees his own blood, he becomes excited and shows his true skills.

programme.title: Reborn
programme.desc: The next battle is between the Rain Guardians. For Yamamoto, it’s a grudge match against Squalo, whom he has lost to before.

programme.title: Reborn
programme.desc: Yamamoto decides to fight using the Shigure Kintoki, the sword that can only used with Shigure Soen Ryu forms. The Rain Guardian battle begins!

programme.title: Reborn
programme.desc: It appears as if Hibari has put an end to the battle, but things start to look different when Mukuro shoots himself with a gun.
programme.sub-title: I Want to Win! Moment of Awakening

programme.title: Reborn
programme.desc: In response to Tsuna's desire to defeat Mukuro, Reborn creates new items, the Criticism Shot and the X Gloves. Tsuna is powered up as a result.
programme.sub-title: The End and From Then on

programme.title: Reborn
programme.desc: Spring has arrived and Tsuna has advanced to his second year of middle school.
programme.sub-title: Eating Sushi to Celebrate Moving up a Grade

programme.title: Reborn
programme.desc: Kyoko is coming to Tsuna's house for a visit, and Tsuna begins cleaning his room for the event. But after a nap, he finds a man's corpse in his room!

programme.title: Reborn
programme.desc: Hana Kurokawa considers the boys in her grade to be monkeys, but amazingly falls in love with Adult Lambo and asks Tsuna to introduce him to her.

programme.title: Reborn
programme.desc: Nana wins a trip on a cruise ship. Tsuna is ready to enjoy some peace and relaxation, but why are Reborn and the others on the same ship?
programme.sub-title: Hide and Seek on a Luxury Cruise

programme.title: Reborn
programme.desc: What started as a tropical cruise takes a turn for the strange as the group lands in Mafia Land, a island that has an amusement park and a beach.

programme.title: Reborn
programme.desc: Tsuna cannot swim, and doesn't want to look bad in front of Kyoko. Yamamoto proposes to help him at the pool, but offers overly abstract advice.
programme.sub-title: A Shark Showed Up in the Public Pool

programme.title: Resurrecting the Champ
programme.desc: An up-and-coming sports reporter rescues a homeless man, only to discover that he is, in fact, a boxing legend believed to have passed away.

programme.title: Night Catches Us
programme.desc: Philadelphia, 1976. After years of mysterious absence, Marcus returns to the neighborhood where he came of age in the midst of the Black Power movement. While his arrival raises suspicion among his family and former neighbors.

programme.title: Harlem Nights
programme.desc: In the waning days of Prohibition, Sugar Ray and his adopted son, Quick, run a speakeasy called Club Sugar Ray. Gangster Bugsy Calhoune pays corrupt cop Phil Cantone to close Club Sugar Ray down.

programme.title: Hoodlum
programme.desc: 1930's New York. The black community of Harlem faces the same indignities as countless millions of refugees. If the seeds of Harlem's urban power would not grow in the White city, the Black underground would form to take control.

programme.title: Jimi: All Is By My Side
programme.desc: A drama based on Jimi Hendrix's life as he left New York City for London, where his career took off.

programme.title: Vampire in Brooklyn
programme.desc: As the vampire Maximillian, the popular star is the most diabolical, dashing and definitely undead dude in the ‘hood’.

programme.title: Harlem Nights
programme.desc: In the waning days of Prohibition, Sugar Ray and his adopted son, Quick, run a speakeasy called Club Sugar Ray. Gangster Bugsy Calhoune pays corrupt cop Phil Cantone to close Club Sugar Ray down.

programme.title: Seven Swords
programme.desc: Seven exceptional warriors band together to protect a village from bounty hunters.

programme.title: House of Flying Daggers
programme.desc: Mei is an exotic, beautiful blind dancer, associated with a dangerous revolutionary gang, known as the House of Flying Daggers. Captured by officers of the decadent Tang Dynasty, Mei finds herself both threatened. Rated: PG-13

programme.title: Chocolate
programme.desc: A young girl learns to fight from watching TV and the fighters at the boxing school next door. She sets upon a violent quest to collect payment for her ailing mother's medical expenses which ultimately leads her to her father, a member of the Yakuza.

programme.title: Ong Bak
programme.desc: Raised by monks who taught him the Thai martial art of muay thai, Ting (Tony Jaa) is sent to Bangkok to retrieve the stolen head of the town's statue of the Buddha.

programme.title: The Raid: Redemption
programme.desc: Deep in the heart of Jakarta's slums lies a drug-gang’s safe house, home to some of the most terrifying and ruthless fighters in the city. Arriving before dawn, an elite swat team moves in to take down the notorious drug lord that runs it.

programme.title: The Raid 2 (Subtitled)
programme.desc: Following immediately after the events of THE RAID, Rama (Iko Uwais) is forced to reinvent himself as an undercover cop in order to provide protection for his wife and child.

programme.title: Merantau
programme.desc: Leaving the simple life in rural West Sumatera, Yuda must undergo merantau, the traditional rite of passage in which a young man must leave his family’s home to make it on his own.

programme.title: Obvious Child
programme.desc: A one night stand leaves a woman (Jenny Slate) with an unexpected surprise just in time for Valentine's Day in this hilarious and heartwarming romantic comedy that has critics audiences raving.

programme.title: So I Married an Axe Murderer
programme.desc: Comedy sensation Mike Myers stars with Nancy Travis in this hatchet-driven romantic comedy about a wedlock-shy coffee house poet who finally meets the perfect woman. Rated: PG-13

programme.title: Postcards From the Edge
programme.desc: Meryl Streep, Shirley MacLaine, Gene Hackman, Dennis Quaid and Richard Dreyfuss star in Mike Nichols' hilarious blockbuster film about a very real mother-daughter relationship set against the backdrop of today's Hollywood. Rated: R

programme.title: Go
programme.desc: Ronna needs to make some extra cash. Simon wants to escape to Vegas for the weekend. Adam and Zack want to stay out of trouble. But it's not just another night in the life of these unusual characters.

programme.title: Safety Not Guaranteed
programme.desc: When an unusual ad inspires three cynical Seattle magazine employees to look for the story behind it, they discover a mysterious eccentric named Kenneth, a likable but paranoid supermarket clerk, who believes he's solved the riddle of time travel.

programme.title: Man of the House
programme.desc: A hard-edged Texas Ranger goes undercover to protect a group of college cheerleaders after they witness a murder.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Come join The Addams Family for the most hilarious scarefest of this season or any other! When long-lost Uncle Fester reappears after twenty-five years in the Bermuda Triangle, Gomez and Morticia plan a celebration to wake the dead.

programme.title: Addams Family Values
programme.desc: The family’s future grows bleak when the no-good nanny marries Fester and has the kids shipped off to summer camp. But Wednesday still has a Thing or two up her sleeve.

programme.title: Wuthering Heights
programme.desc: The greatest love story ever told, Wuthering Heights is an excitingly fresh and distinct take on the classic novel by Emily Brontë.

programme.title: Emma
programme.desc: Emma is a mischievous beauty who sets up her single friends, making a hilariously tangled mess of their lives until she herself falls in love. Gwyneth Paltrow stars in this beloved adaptation of Jane Austen's novel.

programme.title: Nine
programme.desc: A feature film adaptation of the musical inspired by the Fellini film "8½".

programme.title: In the Time of the Butterflies
programme.desc: Salma Hayek gives a powerful, passionate performance as an idealistic young woman who wages a daring struggle for freedom against a murderous dictator (Edward James Olmos) in this moving thriller that tells of the personal toll of political tyranny.

programme.title: Grace of Monaco
programme.desc: Academy Award®-winner Nicole Kidman captures the beauty and elegance of Grace Kelly in this true story of her transition from Hollywood starlet to Princess of Monaco.

programme.title: Emma
programme.desc: Emma is a mischievous beauty who sets up her single friends, making a hilariously tangled mess of their lives until she herself falls in love. Gwyneth Paltrow stars in this beloved adaptation of Jane Austen's novel.

programme.title: The Remains of the Day
programme.desc: Oscar®-winners Anthony Hopkins (The Silence of the Lambs) and Emma Thompson (Howards End) reunite with the acclaimed Merchant Ivory filmmaking team for this extraordinary and moving story of blind devotion and repressed love. Rated PG

programme.title: Sense and Sensibility
programme.desc: Emma Thompson stars in the captivating romance based on Jane Austen's classic novel of two sisters' search for love in strict Victorian society.

programme.title: The Ninth Gate
programme.desc: Roman Polanski directs and Johnny Depp stars in this supernatural thriller about a rare-book dealer who discovers a demonic manuscript.

programme.title: Brawl in Cell Block 99
programme.desc: When Bradley (Vince Vaughn) is sent to prison, he is forced to commit acts of violence that turn the place into a savage battleground.

programme.title: The Adderall Diaries
programme.desc: Nothing is what it seems in this riveting thriller, where a troubled writer (James Franco) is thrown into a passionate affair and forced to confront the secrets of his past while investigating a scandalous high-profile murder.

programme.title: Limitless
programme.desc: A mysterious pill that enables the user to access 100% of his brain's abilities transforms a struggling writer into a financial wizard, but it also puts him in a new world with many dangers.

programme.title: 57 Seconds
programme.desc: When a tech blogger lands an interview with a tech guru and stops an attack on him, he finds a mysterious ring that takes him back 57 seconds into the past.

programme.title: Sleepless
programme.desc: An undercover Las Vegas police officer with a connection to the criminal underworld scours a nightclub in search of his kidnapped son.

programme.title: Enemy at the Gates
programme.desc: Two Russian and German snipers play a game of cat-and-mouse during the Battle of Stalingrad.

programme.title: Killing Me Softly
programme.desc: Woman suspects husband of murdering previous lovers.

programme.title: The Master
programme.desc: Haunted by his past, WW-II veteran and drifter Freddie Quell (Joaquin Phoenix) crosses paths with a mysterious movement led by The Master (Phillip Seymour Hoffman) and his wife (Amy Adams).

programme.title: Night Catches Us
programme.desc: Philadelphia, 1976. After years of mysterious absence, Marcus returns to the neighborhood where he came of age in the midst of the Black Power movement. While his arrival raises suspicion among his family and former neighbors.

programme.title: Air
programme.desc: From award-winning director Ben Affleck, Air reveals the game-changing partnership between a then undiscovered Michael Jordan and Nike’s fledgling basketball division which revolutionized the world of sports and culture with the Air Jordan brand.

programme.title: Ginger & Rosa
programme.desc: In 1962 London, the lifelong friendship between two teenagers (Elle Fanning, Alice Englert) dissolves after one seduces the other's father.

programme.title: Bronson
programme.desc: With an intelligent, provocative and stylized approach, BRONSON (based on a true story) follows the metamorphosis of Mickey Peterson into Britain’s most violent prisoner, Charles Bronson.

programme.title: Lions for Lambs
programme.desc: Lions For Lambs tells the poignant and layered story of several individuals caught up at various ends of the U.S. War on terror.

programme.title: Flags Of Our Fathers
programme.desc: From Academy Award-winning director Clint Eastwood and Academy Award-winner Steven Spielberg, comes the life stories of the six men who raised the flag at The Battle of Iwo Jima, a turning point in WWII.

programme.title: Only the Brave
programme.desc: Only the Brave, based on the true story of the Granite Mountain Hotshots, is the heroic story of a team of local firefighters who – through hope, determination, and sacrifice – become one of the most elite firefighting teams in the nation.

programme.title: Salvation, The
programme.desc: The mighty Mads Mikkelsen unleashes a maelstrom of bloodshed in the Wild West in this white-knuckle tale of revenge, co-starring Eva Green.

programme.title: Jane Got a Gun
programme.desc: A woman asks her ex-lover for help in order to save her outlaw husband from a gang out to kill him.

programme.title: Sanctified
programme.desc: A thrilling Western set in 1890 North Dakota, 'Sanctified' is the tale of an outlaw rescued from death by a nun traveling the Badlands. A deep friendship develops as she nurses the man back to health in exchange for his guidance at a local church.

programme.title: Sweetwater
programme.desc: In the late 1800s, a fanatical religious leader, a renegade Sheriff, and a former prostitute collide in a blood triangle on the rugged plains of the New Mexico Territory.

programme.title: The Sisters Brothers
programme.desc: From acclaimed director Jacques Audiard, and based on the novel by Patrick deWitt, The Sisters Brothers is a reimagining of the cinematic Western as a dangerous, witty, and emotionally cathartic exploration of what it means to be a man.

programme.title: The Homesman
programme.desc: Tommy Lee Jones stars in “the best western since UNFORGIVEN” (BBC). A low-life drifter helps a headstrong woman (Hilary Swank) cross the frontier after she rescues him from hanging.

programme.title: Sweet Country
programme.desc: Australian western set on the Northern Territory frontier in the 1920s, where justice itself is put on trial when an aged Aboriginal farmhand shoots a white man in self-defense and goes on the run as a posse gathers to hunt him down.

programme.title: Bone Tomahawk
programme.desc: When a group of cannibal savages kidnaps settlers from the small town of Bright Hope, an unlikely team of gunslingers, led by Sheriff Hunt (Kurt Russell), sets out to bring them home.

programme.title: I Kill Giants
programme.desc: A woman stands between giants and destruction of her town.

programme.title: Labyrinth
programme.desc: Sixteen-year-old Sarah must solve a labyrinth to rescue her baby brother when he is taken by the Goblin King.

programme.title: The Golden Child
programme.desc: As ‘The Chosen One’, Murphy’s on a madcap mission to save The Golden Child, a youth with mystical powers who’s been abducted by an evil cult.

programme.title: The Adventures of Tintin
programme.desc: Tintin and his friends discover directions to a sunken ship commanded by Capt. Haddock's ancestor and go off on a treasure hunt.

programme.title: Young Sherlock Holmes
programme.desc: When a plague of bizarre, puzzling murders grip London, young Holmes and his new found friend Watson find themselves unwittingly entangled in the dark mystery.

programme.title: The Last Witch Hunter
programme.desc: The last witch hunter (Vin Diesel) is all that stands between humanity and the combined forces of the most horrifying witches in history.

programme.title: Love and Monsters
programme.desc: In a monster-infested world, Joel (Dylan O'Brien) learns his high school sweetheart (Jessica Henwick) is just 80 miles away. Now, Joel must discover his inner hero, facing unknown dangers on the impossible journey to be with the girl of his dreams.

programme.title: Skyline
programme.desc: Jarrod and Elaine travel to Los Angeles to meet his friend Terry and his wife Candice. Terry gives a party in his apartment for Jarrod. The next morning, the group is awakened by beams of light. The group of friends try to escape from the alien invaders.

programme.title: Mission: Impossible - Ghost Protocol
programme.desc: Agent Ethan Hunt and his elite team go underground after a bombing implicates them as terrorists. While trying to clear their name, the team uncovers a plot to start a nuclear war.

programme.title: Mission: Impossible - Rogue Nation
programme.desc: Ethan and team take on their most impossible mission yet, eradicating the Syndicate - an International rogue organization as highly skilled as they are, committed to destroying the IMF.

programme.title: Mission: Impossible
programme.desc: Ethan Hunt, a secret agent, is framed for the deaths of his espionage team and attempts to flee government assassins after him. He races against the clock in order to discover the truth.

programme.title: Mission: Impossible II
programme.desc: The world's greatest spy, Ethan Hunt, returns and partners up with the beautiful Nyah Hall to stop renegade agent Sean Ambrose from releasing a new kind of terror on an unsuspecting world.

programme.title: Mission: Impossible III
programme.desc: Ethan Hunt hurdles into spectacular new adventures from Rome to Shanghai as he races to rescue a captured agent and stop Davian from eliminating his next target, Ethan’s wife.

programme.title: Mission: Impossible - Ghost Protocol
programme.desc: Agent Ethan Hunt and his elite team go underground after a bombing implicates them as terrorists. While trying to clear their name, the team uncovers a plot to start a nuclear war.

programme.title: Kalifornia
programme.desc: A graduate student and his girlfriend set out on a cross-country road trip to research a book they are writing on serial killers. Along the way, they pick up an ex-con and his girlfriend who will take them on a ride they'll never forget.

programme.title: From Dusk Till Dawn
programme.desc: In this thrilling cult classic, two dangerous outlaw brothers head out on a wild crime spree. After kidnapping a father and his two kids, the bad guys head to a seedy Mexican bar for safety but come face to face with blood-sucking vampires.

programme.title: F/X
programme.desc: Rollie Tyler, a movie special-effects man, accepts $30,000 from the Justice Department's Witness Relocation Program to stage the fake assassination of a mob figure who has agreed to name names.

programme.title: The Boondock Saints
programme.desc: Two Irish Catholic brothers become vigilantes and wipe out Boston's criminal underworld in the name of God.

programme.title: From Dusk Till Dawn
programme.desc: In this thrilling cult classic, two dangerous outlaw brothers head out on a wild crime spree. After kidnapping a father and his two kids, the bad guys head to a seedy Mexican bar for safety but come face to face with blood-sucking vampires.

programme.title: Kung Fu Hustle
programme.desc: Stephen Chow is at it again with his newest action-packed and comedic martial-arts adventure, KUNG FU HUSTLE. Rated: R

programme.title: Cutthroat Island
programme.desc: A female pirate and her companion race against their rivals to find a hidden island that contains a fabulous treasure.

programme.title: Cheech & Chong's Nice Dreams
programme.desc: NICE DREAMS - it rhymes with ice creams. And that's what Cheech and Chong are selling in this wacky comedy. The outrageous, permanently spaced-out duo sells enough of their 'specially mixed' ice cream to take the cash and realize their dreams. Rated: R

programme.title: Faceless After Dark
programme.desc: Following her breakout success as the star of a killer clown horror flick, Bowie now finds herself struggling to capitalize on its success. But when she is held hostage by an unhinged fan posing as that same killer clown, horror becomes her reality.

programme.title: Lamb
programme.desc: In rural Iceland, a childless couple discovers a strange and unnatural newborn in their sheep barn. They raise her as their own, but sinister forces are determined to return the creature to the wilderness that birthed her.

programme.title: The Babadook

programme.title: Carrie
programme.desc: Angela Bettis stars in this adaptation of Stephen King's classic tale of horror. Carrie White has been cursed with the power of telekinesis and when her tormenters commit an act of unforgivable humiliation, they'll soon learn a deadly lesson.

programme.title: The Dark Half
programme.desc: A writer undergoes an operation that reveals a twin in his brain. He begins a double writing life, using a pseudonym for his disreputable best-sellers. When the pseudonym discovers he is to be eradicated, he goes on a murderous rampage.

programme.title: Maximum Overdrive
programme.desc: After a mysterious comet turns every machine on Earth into a homicidal rampage device, the survivors at the Dixie Boy Truck Stop are making a stand, and human vengeance goes into overdrive.

programme.title: Clive Barker's Lord Of Illusions
programme.desc: Scott Bakula ("Sibling Rivalry") portrays Harry D’Amour, a private detective visiting Los Angeles on a routine investigation. Harry gets more than he bargains for when he encounters Philip Swan (Kevin J. O’Connor, "The Mummy").

programme.title: Nightbreed: The Director's Cut
programme.desc: Boone may be a troubled young man, but his troubles are just beginning. Set up as the fall guy in a string of slasher murders, he decides he'll hide by crossing the threshold that separates us from them.

programme.title: Blow Out
programme.desc: A Philadelphia sound-effects man witnesses and records a car accident that turns out to be a politically motivated murder.

programme.title: Miami Blues
programme.desc: An ex-con (Alec Baldwin) tiptoes on the borderline of psychotic behavior, playing cops and robbers on both sides of the law. He robs and kills one minute and poses as a cop the next in this thriller with a comic edge.

programme.title: Thief
programme.desc: Michael Mann directs this stylishly photographed action-packed drama that stars James Caan as a master safe cracker who is planning his last heist for the sake of a woman (Tuesday Weld).

programme.title: F/X
programme.desc: Rollie Tyler, a movie special-effects man, accepts $30,000 from the Justice Department's Witness Relocation Program to stage the fake assassination of a mob figure who has agreed to name names.

programme.title: Miracle Mile

programme.title: Bill & Ted's Excellent Adventure
programme.desc: Our non-heinous heroes Bill (Alex Winter) and Ted (Keanu Reeves) are in danger of flunking history! But when the righteous Rufus (George Carlin) arrives in a time-traveling phone booth, the dense dudes discover their destiny!

programme.title: Top Secret!

programme.title: UHF

programme.title: John Grisham's The Rainmaker

programme.title: The Hours
programme.desc: Three women in different times, related by a parallel in their personal lives. One throwing a party for a friend suffering from AIDS. Another in 1949, suffering as a young wife. The last, Virginia Woolf, writing "Mrs. Dalloway".

programme.title: Same Kind of Different as Me

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Kaiba attacks with his mighty Blue-Eyes White Dragon, but Joey has no monsters to defend with! Joey's luck has run out, so it's time for him to rely on skill!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Joey and Kaiba's battle reaches its roaring climax! Will Joey take down his biggest headache and actually teach Kaiba a thing or two about being a true duelist?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Marik proves his The Winged Dragon of Ra is the strongest Egyptian God Card by destroying Slifer the Sky Dragon! None of Yugi's cards can withstand its assault, but a gift from Kaiba may turn the duel around…

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi can't strike Marik's life points, and with every turn that passes, Marik is one step closer to taking down Yugi with a final strike from The Winged Dragon of Ra...

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!

programme.sub-title: Cp9 takes off their masks! Their shocking true faces!

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: CP9 listens to Iceberg’s blood to learn the location of the blueprints, Usopp has another run-in with Franky and the remaining Straw Hats – plus a new friend – race to the rescue!

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Luffy and the gang come face to face with Robin and her CP9 comrades. The rubberman is prepared to fight for his friend, but he’s never faced foes like this!
programme.sub-title: Come back, Robin! Showdown with cp9!

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Luffy, Zoro, and Nami are sent hurtling toward their deaths by the villains of CP9! Meanwhile, Usopp forges an unlikely friendship with Franky while waiting out a storm.
programme.sub-title: The straw hat pirates annihilated? The menace of the leopard model!

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Franky tries to convince Usopp that there’s no hope for the Going Merry, but the sniper – inspired by a mysterious moment from the past – remains loyal to his beloved boat
programme.sub-title: The man who is loved even by his ship! Usopp's tears!

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: A look back at Franky’s past reveals the amazing origins of the sea train – and paints a vivid picture of his younger days, spent alongside Iceberg and the legendary shipwright Tom!
programme.sub-title: Franky's past! The day the sea train first ran!

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Franky’s backstory continues! The sea train is a success, and it looks like Tom’s life is spared! Unfortunately, a government spy is searching for a reason to investigate Tom, and Franky provides the ammunition!
programme.sub-title: Spandam's scheme! The day the sea train shook!

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Tom does the unthinkable in an attempt to protect his apprentices, but young Franky is unable to control his rage, leading to a showdown with a spy – and a train!
programme.sub-title: The end of the legendary man! The day the sea train cried!

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Chopper’s heroism may mean the difference between life and death for Iceberg and Paulie, Nami learns the agonizing truth about Robin, and Sanji prepares to make his move!
programme.sub-title: The truth behind her betrayal! Robin's sorrowful decision!

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Nami makes a frantic dash for the Sea Train station, Chopper searches desperately for Zoro and Luffy, and Sanji plays it cool while waiting for the right time to spring into action.
programme.sub-title: The steam whistle forces friends apart! The sea train starts to run

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Nami arrives at the train station a minute too late, Sanji makes his presence aboard the sea train known, and the search for Luffy and Zoro continues!
programme.sub-title: Sanji barges in! Sea train battle in the storm!

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Chopper and Robin risk their own lives in a desperate attempt to save Luffy and Zoro from a monstrous wall of water! Meanwhile, Sanji moves ever closer to a reunion with Robin.
programme.sub-title: Nami's soul cries out! Straw hat luffy makes a comeback!

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Luffy and Nami ask to borrow a ship so they can chase down the sea train, but the weather is too severe to set sail. Lucky for them, Iceberg and his friends are full of surprises!
programme.sub-title: Another sea train? Rocketman charges forth!

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Luffy, Zoro, Chopper, and Nami rocket toward a rendezvous with the assassins of CP 9, but they’ll need to forge an alliance with some new friends to have any chance at survival!
programme.sub-title: Rescue our friends! A bond among foes sworn with fists!

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Zoro and Luffy go head-to-head with Mother Nature, and Sanji’s rescue mission is bolstered by Franky’s allegiance – and the arrival of the mysterious Sniper King!
programme.sub-title: Smash the wave! Luffy and zoro use the strongest combo!

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Sniper King, a mysterious warrior from the island of snipers, lends a hand as Franky and Sanji try to fight their way to Robin.
programme.sub-title: A mysterious man appears?! His name is sniper king!

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Sanji mixes it up with a deranged cook, Franky dukes it out with the newest member of CP9, and the Sniper King gets creative in his attempt to reach Robin!
programme.sub-title: Showdown between cooks! Sanji vs. Ramen kenpo!

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Franky and Sanji continue to battle the thugs of CP9. Meanwhile, Luffy and the rest of the gang find themselves headed for a collision that could spell doom for everyone!

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Zoro faces a fellow master of the blade, Sanji looks to end his fight against a rampaging ramen master, and Franky finally lands a big blow against his CP9 foe!
programme.sub-title: Clash! Demon-slasher zoro vs. Ship-slasher t-bone!

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: The Sniper King hatches a daring escape plan, but the assassins of CP9 are more powerful than our heroes ever imagined. Meanwhile, Luffy and the gang run into a very familiar frog!
programme.sub-title: Scramble over robin! A cunning plan by sniper king!

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: As their train approaches Enies Lobby, Franky’s kind words cut through Robin’s cold exterior. Luffy’s train is thrown off course, but the group gains a powerful new ally!
programme.sub-title: The judicial island! Full view of enies lobby!

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: The Straw Hats hatch a plan to rescue Robin, but as usual, Luffy can’t wait to find a fight. Will his impulsive attack derail their mission?
programme.sub-title: Landing operations start! Charge in, straw hats!

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Luffy manages to reach the main island, but the Franky Family’s assault is stopped short by a couple of angry giants!
programme.sub-title: Luffy cuts through! Big showdown on the judicial island!

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Luffy makes short work of a few hundred marines, the Franky Family takes down a giant, and the assassins of CP9 report back to Spandam!
programme.sub-title: Battle against giants! Open the second gate!

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Zoro’s quick thinking – and a little help from a giant frog – sends the sea train soaring into the sky on a collision course with armed guards and their canine companions!
programme.sub-title: Find a way out! Rocketman takes flight!

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Nami electrocutes the enemy with a Clima Tact attack, but the bad guys have the Straw Hats surrounded until the Franky Family shows up with a couple of sea monsters!
programme.sub-title: Catch up with luffy! The straw hats' all-out battle

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Zoro, Sanji, Nami, and Chopper try to catch up with their captain, Soge King is nowhere to be found, and Luffy runs head first into a battle with Blueno!
programme.sub-title: Robin betrayed! The motive of the world government!

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Luffy shows off his new strength in a brawl with Blueno, Soge King befriends a giant, and a hulking sea beast makes the ultimate sacrifice.
programme.sub-title: Give robin back! Luffy vs. Blueno!

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: The city of Grand Hexagon lies at the border of France and Spain; the city is designed with six sides. But at the center of the city is Raika Bank storing fifty tons of gold bullion; an alarm will go off if even one bullion is missing.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Robot soldier Lamda flies above the sky of Tokyo, raids a jewelry store. Its creator, professor Oyamada's daughter Maki and Lupin say that it was just a show to demonstrate the inhumanity of robots.

programme.title: LUPIN THE 3rd: Voyage to Danger
programme.desc: Someone sent orders to assassinate Lupin. Will he survive or die trying!?

programme.title: LUPIN THE 3rd TVSP #6 Dragon of Doom
programme.desc: On the bottom of the ocean, within the sunken Titanic, the golden dragon statue waits. When Lupin and the gang are hired to retrieve it, Goemon recognizes the dragon as one of his clan's treasures. Now, he's ready to fight his own friends to protect it!

programme.title: LUPIN THE 3rd TVSP #7 The Pursuit of Harimao's Treasure
programme.desc: To retrieve the Harimao's Treasure, Lupin and the gang must gather three lost statues. Lupin reluctantly partners with the aging "double-O" MI-6 agent Sir Archer and his granddaughter Diana to gather the statues.

programme.title: LUPIN THE 3rd TVSP #8 The Secret of Twilight Gemini
programme.desc: As Lupin's mentor Don Dolune lies on his deathbed, he hands the master thief a gift: the diamond named Twilight. But it's only half of the treasure-the other half of the Twilight can be found in Morocco…

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Notorious gangster, Al Capone left behind five tiles that reveal the location of his massive gold hoard when put together. Out of the five tiles, Lupin and Fujiko have three in their possession.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Inspector Zenigata concocts an extravagant plan to finally capture Lupin by luring him in with a fake meteor made from 6 tons of pure gold. Low and behold, his plan backfires and Lupin and his gang make off with the meteor.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Lupin sneaks into an old castle to steal a collection of priceless angel paintings, owned by the late Malcolm Hurst. Inside the castle, Lupin meets a mysterious girl named Flora, who knows the whereabouts of the angel paintings.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Lupin and Jigen are out at sea attempting to retrieve the gold inside a sunken pirate ship. However, a female pirate gang interrupts their retrieval mission and both parties leave empty-handed.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Lupin and his gang are in South Africa to receive a nautical chart from a retired Nazi that shows the location of a sunken Nazi treasure. However, two young German soldiers interrupt the exchange and a skirmish ensues.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Lupin and his gang are in the small city of San Pico in Central America. However, the city was in the midst of a war between the Government Forces and the Guerilla Army. Leading the Guerilla Army is Jigen's old army pal, Giranco.
programme.sub-title: Here Comes Lupin in a Tank

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Unsurprisingly, Fujiko had once betrayed her heist partner Garb, known as the Grim Reaper, and left him for dead. Garb, who has seemingly returned from the dead, is determined to kill Fujiko and has an uncanny ability to dodge bullets with ease.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: A mysterious cult that idolizes a solid gold Virgin Mary statue abducts Fujiko and they're planning to burn her at the stake as a witch. However, her kidnapper and the cult leader look vaguely familiar to Lupin. Have they crossed paths before?

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Lupin has a horrible case of athlete's foot and visits Dr. Budweiser, who is also a cloning expert, for treatment. The doctor takes a sample of Lupin's skin under the guise of treating his Athlete's foot, but the doctor has another plan up his sleeve.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: A mysterious message appears in the newspaper and Lupin takes it as a sign from this late grandfather, Lupin I, to reclaim his diamond keepsake.
programme.sub-title: A Treasure That Smells Like a Trap

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Lupin manages to steal the Dracula Heart Ruby from a mysterious woman known as Mother. The Dracula Heart Ruby is known to bleed once every century and whoever drinks its blood maintains their youth for another 100 years.
programme.sub-title: The Ruby Sheds Tears of Blood

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Lupin steals a painting of Lupin I's beloved from Baltan Gallery in Paris. However, the painting turns out to be a forgery and Lupin has a clue as to who is painting the forgeries. With his daughter Sophie held hostage.
programme.sub-title: The Prisoner Inside the Baltan Manor

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Lupin and Fujiko attend a lavish party full of wealthy women in order to steal their jewelry. However, the castle tower where the party was being held turns out to be a rocket ship. The hijacked rocket transports the party and guests to a small island.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Mrs. Alda, a wealthy heiress is kidnapped and Lupin shows up to claim the ransom money. However, the real mastermind behind the kidnapping is Mrs. Alda herself. After she gets the ransom money, she erases Lupin's memory and frames him for the crime.
programme.sub-title: Care to Play a Kidnapping Game?

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Lupin learns he needs a pure-hearted girl to find an ancient Persian treasure and his computer chooses a girl named Lori. After getting some hands-on training from Jigen and Goemon, the two are headed to Jordan to find the treasure.

programme.title: Cyborg
programme.desc: Jean-Claude Van Damme stars in this adrenaline-charged sci-fi thriller as Gibson Rickenbacker, the future's most fearsome warrior. In the wake of a plague, Rickenbacker must rescue the only person who can develop a vaccine and save civilization.

programme.title: Machete Kills
programme.desc: The machete-wielding federale returns in this sequel that pits him in a violent battle against a maniacal arms dealer and a revolutionary.

programme.title: Mimic
programme.desc: From Oscar winning director Guillermo del Toro (THE SHAPE OF WATER) comes the ultimate battle between man and nature. Once a miracle of genetic engineering, what was created in the lab has evolved to mimic the most dangerous predator of all—humans.

programme.title: The Running Man
programme.desc: A wrongly-convicted man must try to survive a public execution gauntlet staged as a TV game show.

programme.title: Johnny Mnemonic
programme.desc: Keanu Reeves is a space-age courier who's plugged in, turned on and buffed up to deliver the most important data of the 21st century, wet-wired directly into his brain! A rapid-fire roller coaster of action and high-impact imagery! Rating: R

programme.title: Double Team
programme.desc: Action superstar Jean-Claude Van Damme joins forces with NBA and media sensation Dennis Rodman in this action-packed thriller. Top counter-terrorist Jack Quinn is ready to get out of the spy game until the evil Stavros kidnaps his wife and unborn son.

programme.title: Hellboy
programme.desc: Born in the flames of hell and brought to Earth, Hellboy was rescued from sinister forces by the benevolent Dr. Broom, who raised him to be a hero. Hellboy stands as the key line of defense against an evil madman who seeks to destroy mankind.

programme.title: Mimic
programme.desc: From Oscar winning director Guillermo del Toro (THE SHAPE OF WATER) comes the ultimate battle between man and nature. Once a miracle of genetic engineering, what was created in the lab has evolved to mimic the most dangerous predator of all—humans.

programme.title: Hang 'Em High
programme.desc: Clint Eastwood stars in this brazen tale about a rampaging band of vigilantes who make two mistakes: they hang the wrong man and they don't finish the job. Inger Stevens, Pat Hingle, Bruce Dern & Dennis Hopper co-star in this action-packed western.

programme.title: Support Your Local Gunfighter
programme.desc: James Garner is back in the saddle again as hustler Latigo Smith whose latest con is passing off cowhand Jug (Jack Elam) as the dreaded gunman Swifty Morgan. But when the real Swifty shows up, the Wild West is going to get a whole lot wackier!

programme.title: Support Your Local Sheriff!
programme.desc: James Garner stars in this rollicking western spoof that has him taking on the job of a frontier town sheriff who must fend off villains (led by Walter Brennen) from every direction...all without breaking a sweat or dirtying his shiny black boots!

programme.title: Vera Cruz
programme.desc: In this epic Western, two shady mercenaries (Gary Cooper, Burt Lancaster) in Mexico during the 1866 revolution are hired to escort a Countess and her gold to the Mexican army in Vera Cruz and find themselves at odds with the army…and each other!

programme.title: In Old California
programme.desc: The Duke plays a young, ambitious pharmacist who moves into a brawling frontier town but locks horns with a local crime lord, bent on keeping the town for himself.

programme.title: The Horse Soldiers
programme.desc: John Wayne, Constance Towers and William Holden star in this 1863, fact-based story about a Union mission to destroy a railroad junction deep within Confederate territory.

programme.title: The Alamo
programme.desc: John Wayne produces, directs, and stars in this retelling of the Alamo, a battle in which 185 men joined together against an army of 7,000. Filmed entirely in Texas, "The Alamo" is a visually stunning and historically accurate celebration of courage.

programme.title: Red River
programme.desc: John Wayne, Montgomery Clift and Walter Brennan give stellar performances in Howard Hawks' epic masterpiece as a self-made cattle baron (Wayne) and his adopted son (Clift) risk everything to drive their herd across the treacherous Chisholm Trail.

programme.title: The Island
programme.desc: A man goes on the run after he discovers that he is actually a "harvested being", and is being kept along with others in a utopian facility.

programme.title: Punisher: War Zone
programme.desc: Continuing his crusade to punish violent criminals in America, former FBI agent Frank Castle arrives in New York to take on a scarred villain who plots to take control of the underworld.

programme.title: The Spirit
programme.desc: In the vein of BATMAN BEGINS and SIN CITY, THE SPIRIT takes us on a sinister, gut-wrenching ride with a hero who is born, murdered and born again.

programme.title: Pandorum
programme.desc: Two crew members wake up on an abandoned spacecraft without knowing who they are, how long they've been asleep, or their mission. Soon after, they discover they're not alone, and the situation is more horrifying than they ever could have imagined.

programme.title: The Island
programme.desc: A man goes on the run after he discovers that he is actually a "harvested being", and is being kept along with others in a utopian facility.

programme.title: True Grit
programme.desc: True Grit is a powerful story of vengeance and valor set in an unforgiving and unpredictable frontier where justice is simple and mercy is rare.

programme.title: American Outlaws
programme.desc: When a Midwest town learns that a corrupt railroad baron has captured the deeds to their homesteads without their knowledge, young ranchers join forces to take back what is rightfully theirs.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: The communities thought they could build a better future separately, but the recent loss of one of their own drives them to band together; new leaders rise when a disturbing and dangerous threat is unmasked; an escaped captive revisits his past.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: A new arrival at the Hilltop opens up about the leader of a group of mask-wearing savages; a search party sets out on a daring mission to find two missing friends.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: The savage group led by Alpha confronts the Hilltop in a harrowing attempt to retrieve her daughter; a supply run for the Kingdom turns into a dangerous quest.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: While one community struggles to ease tensions that threaten to divide from within, the true nature of another group comes into focus; a mission to rescue a friend has deadly consequences.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Daryl's daring rescue mission forces Alpha to unleash a group of her own to retrieve what belongs to her, even if the price is paid in blood; the Kingdom's plans to reunite the communities are put in jeopardy.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: An outsider's arrival forces Alexandria to rehash devastating old wounds; eye-opening secrets from the past are revealed.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: The fair at the Kingdom is underway, with all four communities coming together in celebration for the first time in years; while some pacts are renewed, other deals will come at a much steeper price.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: In the aftermath of an overwhelming loss, the communities must brave a ferocious blizzard; as one group deals with an enemy from within, another is forced to make a life or death decision.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: The group in Oceanside continues to train in case the Whisperers return; tensions are high as the heroes struggle to hold onto their concept of civilization.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: A flashback reveals the origins of Alpha and Beta; Alpha attempts to toughen up Lydia as they prepare to walk with the dead; the Whisperers create their herds.
programme.sub-title: We Are the End of the World

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: The threat of the Whisperers return leads to paranoia sweeping over Alexandria; in the meantime, Carol battles with the need for revenge.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Still-paranoid Alexandrians get riled up over the Whisperers and take their fear out on Negan; at Hilltop, the group deals with an unexpected safety issue.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Supplies go missing from Hilltop; Negan is idolized by an Alexandrian; Ezekiel holds a secret.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Carol and Daryl go on a mission together while Siddiq struggles to solve a mystery.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Carol pushes boundaries that make Daryl uncomfortable; Alpha and Beta have reservations about someone.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: A fight causes tensions in Oceanside while the Alexandrians set out on a high-stakes mission.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: The group must figure out how to get out of a precarious situation.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: The group must defend Alexandria from a threatening outside force.

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Over the summer, the girls go camping in the mountains, where they run into the Three Lights, who are there shooting for an upcoming film.
programme.sub-title: The Screaming Dead: Terror of the Camp Monster

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Usagi ends up agreeing to let Seiya spend the night at her place. Worried about leaving two teenagers together, the rest of the girls decide to join.

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Taiki begins to question if their activity as Three Lights is really helping with their goal of finding their missing princess.

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Chibi-Chibi has been coming home with lots of snacks. Curious where she’s getting the snacks from, Usagi and the girls decide to follow Chibi-Chibi.
programme.sub-title: Chibi-Chibi's Mystery: The Big Noisy Chase

programme.desc: Usagi teamed up with Seiya for the school softball tournament. Usagi becomes a target of Seiya’s jealous fans, who think she is hitting on him.

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Sailor Aluminum Siren learns that Usagi is Sailor Moon. She sets a trap on a plane in order to get Usagi’s attention.

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: A rift is created between the Sailor Guardians and the Star Lights after they discover each other’s secret identities.

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Uranus and the other Outer Guardians warn the Star Lights to never see Sailor Moon again. Usagi is worried about Seiya after he gets injured.

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Ami and the others try to clear up the misunderstanding the Three Lights have about Usagi.

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Minako is close to realizing her lifelong dream of becoming an idol after making it to the final round of auditions in a talent-search contest.

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Sailor Lead Crow finds a note left behind by her deceased friend Sailor Aluminum Siren that contains information on Sailor Moon’s true identity.

programme.desc: Princess Kakyu appears before the Sailor Guardians. Princess Kakyu explains that she has come to Earth in search of the Light of Hope.

programme.desc: Usagi finally confesses to Rei that she’s been unable to get in touch with Mamoru. The Three Lights publicly announce their intention to disband.

programme.desc: As Galaxia closes in to take Sailor Moon’s star seed, the Light of Hope reveals itself. The Light of Hope begs Usagi to use its power to stop Galaxia.

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Usagi Tsukino is a schoolgirl who meets a talking cat named Luna. Usagi is transformed into Sailor Moon, the guardian who fights for love and justice.

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: A house of fortune opens up and gains popularity for its predictions. The customers begin to act violent. Usagi and Luna decide to investigate.

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: The girls in town are tuning in to a radio program that reads out love letters. A sleeping sickness is plaguing the town that puts people to sleep.

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Usagi is shocked to find out that she’s gained weight from too much eating. Determined to get back into shape, Usagi and her friends join a gym.

programme.desc: Shingo brings home a pet Chanela. Shingo becomes so absorbed in the Chanela that he stops going to school, which worries Usagi.

programme.title: Sailor Moon

programme.title: Sailor Moon

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Usagi and Ami find a clock that resembles Luna. That night, the clock emits a strange light that causes Usagi to become very impatient.

programme.title: Sailor Moon

programme.title: Redenção
programme.desc: História do ex-motoqueiro e traficante Sam Childers, que tornou-se um grande lutador em defesa das crianças do Sudão, obrigadas a virar soldados muito antes de se tornarem homens. O sujeito se dedica com paixão às crianças e acaba deixando um pouco de lado sua vida nos Estados Unidos, onde tem esposa e filha. Conhecido como "pastor da metralhadora", ele não tem problema em pegar em armas para defender o que pensa.

programme.title: Jogo De Morte
programme.desc: O agente Marcus é enviado para matar um traficante de armas, mas a CIA tem outros planos.

programme.title: Risco Imediato
programme.desc: Um jovem casal de americanos que vive em Londres tem uma grande divida por justa causa. Uma manhã eles encontram que o inquilino do apartamento de baixo morre e deixa 200.000 em dinheiro. Tudo o que eles têm a fazer é pegar o dinheiro e todos os seus problemas seriam resolvidos. Então eles fazem, e desde ahi coisas muito ruins começam a acontecer para eles.

programme.title: Shock Wave 2
programme.desc: Poon Shing-Fung (Andy Lau) é um policial especialista em desarmar bombas. No meio de uma ação, uma explosão ocorre e ele acaba entrando em coma, além de perder a memória. Ao acordar, Poon recebe a informação de está sendo investigado, acusado de fazer parte do atentado que na verdade, ele estava trabalhando para tentar impedir. Enquanto isso, um verdadeiro terrorista especialista em explosivos, cuja gangue foi derrubada, busca vingança. Ele ameaça explodir um túnel de Hong Kong com centenas de reféns. O policial deverá tentar detê-lo novamente.

programme.title: Dupla em Fúria
programme.desc: O jovem detetive Wang Bu'er e seu amigo Huang Feihong embarcam em uma investigação cheia de emoção e eventos inesperados.

programme.title: Operações Especiais
programme.desc: O ex-agente de operações especiais Tom Steele (Seagal) e seu parceiro Manning (Austin) recebem a missão de cuidar do fechamento de uma antiga prisão. Lá, eles devem supervisionar a chegada de duas misteriosas prisioneiras. Quando as verdadeiras identidades das mulheres são reveladas, Steele percebe que eles estão presos no meio de algo muito maior do que ele imaginava.

programme.title: Redenção
programme.desc: História do ex-motoqueiro e traficante Sam Childers, que tornou-se um grande lutador em defesa das crianças do Sudão, obrigadas a virar soldados muito antes de se tornarem homens. O sujeito se dedica com paixão às crianças e acaba deixando um pouco de lado sua vida nos Estados Unidos, onde tem esposa e filha. Conhecido como "pastor da metralhadora", ele não tem problema em pegar em armas para defender o que pensa.

programme.title: Jogo De Morte
programme.desc: O agente Marcus é enviado para matar um traficante de armas, mas a CIA tem outros planos.

programme.title: Risco Imediato
programme.desc: Um jovem casal de americanos que vive em Londres tem uma grande divida por justa causa. programme.title: Shock Wave 2
programme.desc: Poon Shing-Fung (Andy Lau) é um policial especialista em desarmar bombas. No meio de uma ação, uma explosão ocorre e ele acaba entrando em coma, além de perder a memória. Ao acordar, Poon recebe a informação de está sendo investigado, acusado de fazer parte do atentado que na verdade, ele estava trabalhando para tentar impedir. Enquanto isso, um verdadeiro terrorista especialista em explosivos, cuja gangue foi derrubada, busca vingança. Ele ameaça explodir um túnel de Hong Kong com centenas de reféns. O policial deverá tentar detê-lo novamente.

programme.title: Jogo de Poder
programme.desc: Xangai, 1930. Os irmãos Lin Zihao e Fang Jie entram em uma briga de gangues para salvar a cidade dos planos conspiratórios do Sr. Tang, pai da mulher que é apaixonada por Lin Zihao e amada por Fang Jie.

programme.title: Guerreiros do Amanhã
programme.desc: O que começa como uma aventura para adolescentes irresponsáveis (diversão, praia, hormônios em fúria) logo adquire um tom apocalíptico quando uma guerra contra a Austrália é deflagrada, o que ninguém poderia prever. Os oito adolescentes precisam escapar e tentar sobreviver em um mundo que não se parece mais com o que era antes.

programme.title: Encontrando o Amor em Nebraska
programme.desc: Kennedy Blaine, uma garota californiana, herda um rancho na pequena cidade de Valentine, em Nebraska. Antes de vender a propriedade, ela decide passar o verão no rancho e aprender mais sobre sua família.

programme.title: Enquanto Houver Esperança
programme.desc: Esta é a história de Angélica, uma garota de 16 anos que está lutando contra um tipo raro de câncer chamado Síndrome Mielodisplásica, sua luta para tentar viver uma vida normal e sua esperança de encontrar seu primeiro amor antes que seja tarde demais.

programme.title: Nada é para sempre
programme.desc: Embora Norman e Paul, filhos de um pastor protestante, tenham recebido uma educação rígida, eles também desfrutaram de liberdade. Norman, um jovem reservado e criterioso, é professor e está apaixonado. Paul, extrovertido, é jornalista e leva uma vida desordenada. Apesar de tudo, há uma coisa que sempre os manterá juntos: o rio selvagem que atravessa Montana, onde aprenderam a pescar.

programme.title: A História de Wim de A a Z
programme.desc: Situado por volta de 1900, Apenstreken (A História de Wim de A a Z) Esta é a história do órfão Wim, que quer muito ir à escola, em vez de passar todo o seu tempo trabalhando forçadamente na fábrica da cidade. Com uma dose de esperteza e com a ajuda de um pequeno macaco, Wim encontra novos amigos, uma escola divertida e uma família amorosa.

programme.title: Eu Amo Shakey
programme.desc: Um pai carinhoso se muda com sua filha para um apartamento em um edifício chique, livres de aluguel, mas há um problema: É PROIBIDO CÃES! Isso significa que eles terão que esconder seu adorável filhote, Shakey, mas isso não é tão fácil quanto parece. Shakey tem o hábito de escapar e acaba sendo pego pelo síndico desastrado. Ameaçados de despejo, o que eles farão para continuar com o Shakey?

programme.title: Turma da Luta
programme.desc: Crianças de um bairro pobre enfrentam a invicta equipe Beverly Hills Junior National Karate.

programme.title: Encontrando o Amor em Nebraska
programme.desc: Kennedy Blaine, uma garota californiana, herda um rancho na pequena cidade de Valentine, em Nebraska. Antes de vender a propriedade, ela decide passar o verão no rancho e aprender mais sobre sua família.

programme.title: Enquanto Houver Esperança
programme.desc: Esta é a história de Angélica, uma garota de 16 anos que está lutando contra um tipo raro de câncer chamado Síndrome Mielodisplásica, sua luta para tentar viver uma vida normal e sua esperança de encontrar seu primeiro amor antes que seja tarde demais.

programme.title: Espião Por Acaso
programme.desc: Um menino é envolvido em uma aventura de espionagem quando acidentalmente acorda um agente do serviço secreto. Juntos, eles tentam resolver um misterioso crime sem solução há quarenta anos.

programme.title: O Garoto de Ouro
programme.desc: Quando Mats encontra um par de calças que contém uma quantidade ilimitada de dinheiro no bolso a vida

programme.title: Desenhos Animados do Velho Testamento - Moises
programme.desc: O rei do Egito é avisado da profecia de que Messias chegará. Para evitar que o inimigo sobreviva, ele ordena que matem todos os bebês do sexo masculino.

programme.title: Desenhos Animados do Velho Testamento - Samuel, o Menino Profeta
programme.desc: Havia em Israel uma mulher estéril chamada Ana, cujo maior desejo era ter um filho. Um dia, ao ir ao templo, ela pediu ao Senhor que lhe desse um bebê, e o prometeu que ao nascer, o entregaria para viver no templo, servindo por toda a vida ao Senhor.

programme.title: A Colônia
programme.desc: Na nova era glacial, um grupo de sobreviventes luta para proteger a humanidade de uma ameaça muito mais selvagem do que a natureza.

programme.title: Aprisionados
programme.desc: Realizado em uma delegacia de polícia remota, um estranho misterioso toma conta das mentes e das almas de todos dentro.

programme.title: Reféns do Mal
programme.desc: Coisas sinistras começam a acontecer com os sequestradores que estão mantendo um menino para resgate em uma cabana remota.

programme.title: Blood Creek
programme.desc: No período entre as duas guerras mundiais, a família alemã Wollner recebe uma proposta tentadora do Terceiro Reich: hospedar o professor Richard With em sua fazenda em Morgan County, Virginia. A família mal sabia que With tinha intenções ocultas por trás dessa visita, levando à perseguição e extermínio dos Wollner. Mais de sete décadas depois, o jovem Evan Marshall está perturbado pelo desaparecimento do irmão. Depois de dois anos, ele decide seguir com a sua vida, mas certo dia, o irmão Victor reaparece, dizendo que foi sequestrado e mantido na fazenda dos Wollner, próxima de Town Creek. Os dois irmãos elaboram um plano para se vingarem dos responsáveis pelos crimes.

programme.title: A Presença
programme.desc: Depois de ser sequestrado por alienígenas, um jovem cientista da NASA fica obcecado em encontrar pistas sobre o que aconteceu quando descobre que ninguém acredita que sua experiência realmente aconteceu.

programme.title: Sem Perdão
programme.desc: Vint está em um casamento problemático. Após fazer uma viagem com a esposa, eles são sequestrados e ele deixado para morrer e sua esposa desaparece. Meses depois, ele acorda do coma após o surgimento de evidências e a desistência das autoridades. As duas equipes se unem e voltam para a pequena cidade onde sua esposa foi vista pela última vez.

programme.title: Aprisionados
programme.desc: Realizado em uma delegacia de polícia remota, um estranho misterioso toma conta das mentes e das almas de todos dentro.

programme.title: Reféns do Mal
programme.desc: Coisas sinistras começam a acontecer com os sequestradores que estão mantendo um menino para resgate em uma cabana remota.

programme.title: A Colônia
programme.desc: Na nova era glacial, um grupo de sobreviventes luta para proteger a humanidade de uma ameaça muito mais selvagem do que a natureza.

programme.title: Blood Creek
programme.desc: No período entre as duas guerras mundiais, a família alemã Wollner recebe uma proposta tentadora do Terceiro Reich: hospedar o professor Richard With em sua fazenda em Morgan County, Virginia. A família mal sabia que With tinha intenções ocultas por trás dessa visita, levando à perseguição e extermínio dos Wollner. Mais de sete décadas depois, o jovem Evan Marshall está perturbado pelo desaparecimento do irmão. Os dois irmãos elaboram um plano para se vingarem dos responsáveis pelos crimes.

programme.title: Maré Negra
programme.desc: Mergulhador profissional retorna após 1 ano em um encontro quase fatal com um grande tubarão branco.

programme.title: A Maldição do Castelo Margam
programme.desc: Uma equipe de parapsicólogos americanos viaja ao País de Gales para realizar um estudo no Castelo de Margam, um dos edifícios mais assombrados do Reino Unido.

programme.title: Invasores - Nenhum Sistema está a Salvo
programme.desc: O deslocado Benjamin e o carismático Max compartilham um interesse mútuo: hackear os sistemas do mundo. Junto com os amigos de Max, eles formam o grupo subversivo CLAY. Quando o CLAY começa a ser investigado pelo serviço secreto alemão e pela Europol, Benjamin vai precisar enfrentar as consequências de seus atos.

programme.title: A noite dos mortos
programme.desc: É Halloween em 1997, e também a última noite na escola para dois adolescentes skatistas, que vão deixar para trás a fase escolar e adentrar na famosa fase adulta. Mas, para um deles, Corey, alguns assuntos do passado ainda precisam ser resolvidos envolvendo um velho conhecido da infância. Para isso, os dois vão embarcar em uma viagem apavorante através de suas memórias, sonhos e medos.

programme.title: Profissão de Risco
programme.desc: Jack é contratado por Dragna, um chefão do crime, para realizar uma tarefa aparentemente inocente: ele deve levar uma mala para um motel em Nova Orleans e esperar que ela seja recolhida. Mas Jack nunca conseguirá abrir a mala. Mas, no momento em que ele entra no motel, sua vida está em risco. Vários criminosos tentam tirar a bolsa dele e Jack precisa defendê-la se quiser viver.

programme.title: Golpe de Risco
programme.desc: Carregado de muita ação, este filme une os maiores ladrões do mundo na tentativa de executar o roubo do século.

programme.title: Um Homem Comum
programme.desc: Um criminoso de guerra escondido estabelece um relacionamento com sua única conexão com o mundo exterior - sua empregada.

programme.title: A noite dos mortos
programme.desc: É Halloween em 1997, e também a última noite na escola para dois adolescentes skatistas, que vão deixar para trás a fase escolar e adentrar na famosa fase adulta. Mas, para um deles, Corey, alguns assuntos do passado ainda precisam ser resolvidos envolvendo um velho conhecido da infância. Para isso, os dois vão embarcar em uma viagem apavorante através de suas memórias, sonhos e medos.

programme.title: Sequestro Relâmpago
programme.desc: Lorraine, uma mãe solteira desamparada e seu filho de 8 anos, são sequestrados por Roy, um violento ladrão de bancos, que a obriga a dirigir através do país para encontrar o cúmplice que está com o dinheiro do roubo. A luta de Lorraine pela sobrevivência marca o início de sua jornada rumo à liberdade.

programme.title: A Recompensa
